title: Gunshot fired in Philadelphia high school; 3 students held
title_page: Gunshot fired in Philadelphia high school; 3 students held | Daily Mail Online
text:
Gunshot fired in Philadelphia high school; 3 students held
PHILADELPHIA (AP) — Police say three students are in custody after a gun went off during a fight at a Philadelphia high school. No one was injured.
The gunshot was fired at Benjamin Franklin High School just before noon Friday as a group of boys fought in a stairwell.
Officer Christine O'Brien says SWAT teams went room to room in the school looking for the gun and suspects. She says the school was on lockdown and was being evacuated as areas were cleared.
The weapon was recovered.
O'Brien says interviews are underway and others may be taken into custody.
